author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0225 Remove groupId/artifactId/version parameterization from POMs
Removed all parameterization of groupId/artifactId/version.
Added explicit versions for all plugins in pluginManagement section in main POM.
(this is to ensure repetitive builds and to remove some warnings given my Maven3).
Removed all properties propagation for testcases as the used version of Maven &
sure-fire plugins propagate them when running testcases in a forked JVM.
Fixed some exclusions in dependencies and removed some leftover versions in
dependencies, all versions for all dependencies are now in the dependencyManagement
section of the main POM.
Updated ENG_Building twiki.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0108 Add support for Derby as Oozie DB
Testcases, when using Derby, run forking on every testcase to avoid some Derby re-initialization issues.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0227 log directory should be created if doesn't exist
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0222 Some time sensitive testcases fail when the test machine is slow
changing the testing strategy to account or workaround a slower than expected execution of the tests.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0182 WorkflowFunctionalSpec needs to fix chmod examples
